Posts.Content: I am interested in talking with others about prostate cancer.
Posts.Title: Prostate cancer diagnosis

Posts.Content: I had prostate surgery in January. Went through the incontinence but my surgeon was right as to how things would heal and when. At first when I was prescribed Viagra I took nor 1 daily per surgeons recommended dosage. Things were coming along. Some heavy feeling in the morning about 4am and erections and orgasm. Them I went in to get blood work 0 PSA. GOOD. I THOUGHT THE doctor said at this point to take 4-5 pills when expecting sexual activity. Did I misunderstand? I have got nothing now. I have a whole new appreciation of the phase " can't get it up". Never has this happened to me before. I mean totally limp. Still can orgasm, urine fountain. Maybe I should go back to one a day and 4-5 when anticipating sexual activity. I am really bummed out. Thinking of vacuum device. I really have nothing, just totally limp. Any suggestions welcome. L.p.
Posts.Signature: Age 65 at Dx. 8/28/17 PSA 7.5 9/15/17DRE ok 9/15 PSA 9.57biopsy 4+3 10/15/17 right benign Left 6 cores 60% involvement Doctor suggest surgery Second opinion Gleason 4+5 second pathologists opinion Surgery recommended doctor says surgery went well Lymph nodes clear Robotic surgery 01/18/2018 Catheter out 01/24/2818 Waiting for incontinence to get over No erections yet Heavy feeling in penis some mornings 3AM 02/18/2018 3 vialis some erection Not like before surgery People say let yourself heal 2/20/2018 incontinence much better PSA 02/28/2018 <.05 Orgasm-- not like before surgery Incontinence varies day to day 3/10/18 good solid erection Orgasm with urine Incontinence getting better
Posts.Title: Erectile dysfunction after da vinci surgery

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for the kind words and the words of wisdom. I guess I was so happy about things getting better so quick that I always expect things to go in an upward direction and then when things they go. back a couple steps I get really anxious. I don't really know why I feel this way because the incontinence was a step forward and then back three steps. But that got a whole better even within the last two weeks. In reference to the Viagra they are 20 mg. I was so discouraged that my wife suggested going back to one tablet a day. She is very smart so I will try that. Thanks again.

Posts.Title: Erectile dysfunction after da vinci surgery

Posts.Content: I have very similar situation. My surgery was done 01/18/2018 and catheter out 01/24/2018. My progress has been very close to what the doctor said it would be. I go through lots off clothes and that is annoying. Started going to the Y. That has helped. It has lots off equipment. I wish you well and will be praying for you l.P.p
